channel.title: CVE Feed for elementinvader -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for elementinvader -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47630|2024-10-05T13:20:38.867Z -- elementinvader -- elementinvader%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ElementInvader ElementInvader Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ElementInvader Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 1.2.7.
